price: Isipokuwa waja wa Mwenyezi Mungu waliokhitariwa.
footnotes: Lakini walikuwapo Waumini ambao aliwakhitari Mwenyezi Mungu wamuabudu Yeye, ili wapate fadhila za ukarimu wake. Basi hao walizipata thawabu zake, na wakaepukana na adhabu yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
